h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Upper Pagoda (Level 3)
From the Upper Pagoda Shrine, your journey to the top will continue. A singular path will lie on the outdoor ring that you can progress across.

Up ahead, watch out for an ambushing Frozen Corpse before you reach another long wooden plank that you'll need to cross. You may also run into another Lantern Sentry on this section of the walkway, so be sure to take him out as well.

img_summary: The image depicts a treacherous section of the Upper Pagoda (Level 3) in *The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm*. A character is navigating a narrow, weathered wooden plank suspended over a deep chasm, with chains and rocky walls surrounding the area. Ahead, an enemy figure stands on a platform, suggesting an imminent confrontation. This visual aligns with the preceding text, which warns of ambushes and challenges, such as Frozen Corpses and Lantern Sentries, while progressing along the outdoor ring toward the pagoda's summit.
